settings.heading: 93% Success ratewith 1,50,000+ Indians
settings.subheading: Know The Root Cause Of Your Hair Loss

settings.maleContent: Nutrient deficiencies result from poor diet or a compromised gut microbiome.
settings.femaleContent: Nutritions build the hair fibre and define texture, quality and strength. Deficiency leads to hair fall.

settings.maleContent: Influenced by inflamation, highglycemic diet and thyroid issues
settings.femaleContent: DHT (androgenic alopecia) causes hair roots to shrink and hair to thin and fall out.

settings.maleContent: DHT sensitivity can be caused by genetics, stress, meds, poor diet and toixins.
settings.femaleContent: Excessive androgen hormones lead to hair fall that is slow but makes the scalp visible.

settings.maleContent: Short term or chronic, physical or emotional stress like a surgery or demanding job.
settings.femaleContent: Stress shifts hair root to rest phase to excessive hairfall.

settings.maleContent: Refers to your surroundings, the products you use and the foods that you eat.
settings.femaleContent: Excessive Hair fall 4 to 6 months after delivery. Get natural, breast feeding safe treatment.

settings.text4: Our approach combines the goodness of three sciences. With ingredients from the most authentic sources, we personalize your treatment delivering assured results.

settings.steps-text: An online test that assess the root cause of your hair fall & provides a treatment plan.
Understand your hair fall and make the purchase to await doctor’s prescriptions.
A personal hair coach guides you throughout the journey.

settings.regrow_text: Regrow Your Hair With A Personal Hair Coach

settings.name: Uddeshya
settings.content: My hair loss started in 2016 after I was diagnosed with tuberculosis. I had consulted a dermatologist and tried many treatments before nearly giving up hope. I liked Traya’s approach of combining three sciences. After I used the recommended product kits, I have seen a lot of benefits like thicker hair and negligible Hair fall.

settings.content: I had been losing my hair for about two years. I tried to convince myself that it wasn't noticeable but I knew it was and so did everyone else who saw me. I started my treatment with Traya and not only is the problem solved, but people are noticing how much it's grown back.

settings.content: Hey! Was apprehensive at first because it was my first time getting into something like this. Throughout school and college I was blessed with good hair but after being diagnosed with covid in early 2021, I noticed that I had lost a good chunk of my hair at the crown and front section of my head. After reaching out to Traya ( came across them via Instagram ) I took the plunge. Had a long conversation with Raveena (the hair specialist/ doctor assigned to me) and we found out that i was in stage 4 of hair loss and this worried me considerably. Raveena assured me that this issue can be reversed and new hair can grow back in the affected areas. Fast forward to 6 months... Followed the diet and medication strictly and all that Raveena had mentioned was true. Really happy with the outcome. Thank you Traya & Raveena.

settings.name: Jayamon
settings.content: My Overall experience with Traya Products is wonderful and I strongly recommend Traya, personally I have started to notice change in my hair and also volume. I am in my 5th kit now and just not stopping here. The only key to get desired results is consistency. My Hair coach Raveena has guided me through this whole process and made it possible for me. So a big thanks to Raveena and team for this. Once again thank you Traya team for giving me such an amazing result. For those who want effective results, I have only one recommendation - have patience and stick to your diet & medicines.

settings.name: Karthikeyan
settings.content: I'm a 23 year old guy working in IT sector for past 3½ years. I tried different ayurvedha oils and shampoos on the market but nothing helped a lot. After filling Traya’s form, I got call from the team. The team cleared my doubts and I enrolled for the treatment on December, 2021. I received my 1st month kit and got assigned to Hair Coach, Mr. Nihal, who is clear in providing instructions and open to address all sorts of questions. I could literally see new hair growing at the borders of my forehead and the density of the hair was getting thicker. Throughout this process, I learnt that hair health is just the reflection of our health and lifestyle (genetic traits and chronic diseases are exception). Missing of essential nutrients in our diet, physical activity and lack of sound sleep are directly connected to hair loss which alarms us to get in track to fix that. No imported hair oil or expensive shampoo can fix that.
